Quote: "A change in the weather is sufficient to recreate the world and ourselves." -Marcel Proust
Author: Marcel Proust

Quote: "Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine." -Anthony J. D'Angelo
Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

Quote: "Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces us up, snow is exhilarating; there is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather." -John Ruskin
Author: John Ruskin

Quote: "Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet." -Bob Marley
Author: Bob Marley

Quote: "Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine." -Anthony J. D’Angelo
Author: Anthony J. D’Angelo

Quote: "Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise." -Victor Hugo
Author: Victor Hugo

Quote: "Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes." -Oscar Wilde
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quote: "First solve the problem, then write the code." -John Johnson
Author: John Johnson

Quote: "The code you write makes you a programmer. The code you delete makes you a good one." -Mario Fusco
Author: Mario Fusco

Quote: "Simplicity is the soul of efficiency." -Austin Freeman
Author: Austin Freeman

Quote: "Whether you think you can, or you think you can't—you're right." -Henry Ford
Author: Henry Ford

Quote: "If you want to see the sunshine, you have to weather the storm." -Frank Lane
Author: Frank Lane

Quote: "Climate is what we expect, weather is what we get." -Mark Twain
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: "You can't get mad at weather because weather's not about you. Apply that lesson to most other aspects of life." -Douglas Coupland
Author: Douglas Coupland

Quote: "If you want to see the sunshine, you have to weather the storm" - Frank Lane
Author: Frank Lane

Quote: "The storm starts, when the drops start dropping, When the drops stop dropping then the storm starts stopping." -Dr. Seuss
Author: Dr. Seuss

Quote: "Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces us up, snow is exhilarating; there is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather." -John Ruskin
Author: John Ruskin

Quote: "There's no such thing as good weather, or bad weather. There's just weather and your attitude towards it." -Louise Hay
Author: Louise Hay

Quote: "What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness." -John Steinbeck
Author: John Steinbeck
